name: One Pot Sausage Rice
steps: Dice the onions and cut the sausage into small pieces.
Brown the sausages in a pot with olive oil.
Add the onions and cook until soft and transparent.
Add the rice, diced tomatoes, beef stock, and salt.
Add water until everything in the pot is submerged.
Cover and simmer it until the rice is cooked, around 20 minutes.
